title: What's happening?!
body: I've been a Talon main for a couple of months now and I have to say, the rework was really great and all and as of now, I own SSW and Dragonblade but recently, I'm starting to feel a bit bored. I like playing him but I don't look forward to playing him as much as I used to. Am I getting bored of my main?

replies.body:
Playing the same thing over and over again, can make you bored no matter how much you love the champ.

I have 3 main champions, and i love them all to bits! But even though i can rotate between them for variety, I still have days where the last thing I want to do is play the same champs I've been playing all year. (or for the last couple of years, in the case of Azir)

Sometimes it pays to just take a break and play a champ you don't often play, for a while at least. You come back to your main feeling refreshed and ready to enjoy them again.

Give it a try ^^
see how it goes
Talon wont mind.. he probably isnt the jealous type :P
You feel like trying more champs who have been changed greatly recently, or you are on your path towards giving this game up gradually.
